title: Who are the best math teachers in India on YouTube for class 12 for the board level? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will say you can follow our channel and Quora Space for board level exam and also for competitive exams like JEE… Channel name:-Road To IIT Quora Space:-Free JEE Coaching We provide best FREE Education for 11th and 12th Science Students. We deliver full course chapter wise in which we cover from very basic formula to previous year numericals. We provide lots of previous year numericals with techniques that tell them how to approach the question and solve it. I will say no more words by my own. If you are serious aspirants, I will recommend you to visit the YouTube channel and spend some time there. I will assure you that you will love it. Most important thing…if you like it please comment our good things here or in videos. If you don't like it please comment our flaws…we want to go long so we want to Improve. Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish is our motto. Thank you. Regards…

•CBSE Class Videos channel , °He is best and gives you a thinking ability on different questions. •Also Study Zee , °He is very good but he gives many examples that is a good thing but then you don't use your brain. •Watch introduction videos of Cbse class videos and then solve NCERT. (See solutions when you got stuck). °His own book is of high level and is for 100/100 aimers. •If you are solving RD Sharma(Solved Examples) only then STUDY ZEE Would be better. •Just make sure to solve past year book by Arihant also.
